unnormalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!
normalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Exam season got you stressed? Don't sweat it! In today's world of Education Technology, we have amazing tools right at our fingertips – exam prep apps! Forget lugging around heavy textbooks, these apps can be a real game-changer, especially when you're cramming last minute at your Grandma's house in Patna.

unnormalised: So, what makes these apps so great? Firstly, convenience! You can study anywhere – on the bus to college, waiting for your chai at that roadside stall near Delhi University, or even hiding in the bathroom during a boring family function. Secondly, they offer personalized learning. Many apps use AI to figure out your weak areas and create custom study plans. No more wasting time on stuff you already know!

unnormalised: Some top contenders in the Indian market include Vedantu, BYJU's (yeah, the one with Shah Rukh Khan!), and Gradeup. They offer everything from practice tests modeled on the actual exams (like the CAT and UPSC), to video lectures taught by Dr. Sharma from IIT Kanpur. Plus, many offer free content to get you started!
